C

canvas - Variable in class gui.LogicBoardGUI
Display the actual model as a grid.
clickedNearConnection(Vector3Int, Gate, Vector2Int, GateIndex) - Method in class boardModel.LogicBoard
Check if a position (of a right mouse click) lies close to a connection on the board.
command - package command
 
Command - Interface in command
A command wraps a task - like placing a gate in the model - into an object, storing the necessary information to undo and redo the task.
compareTo(Vector2Int) - Method in class utility.Vector2Int
 
componentwiseMaximum(Vector2Int) - Method in class utility.Vector2Int
Compare this vector's components to those of another vector, and set this vector's component to the maximum of the components.
computeOutput(boolean, boolean) - Method in class gates.ANDgate
 
computeOutput(boolean, boolean) - Method in class gates.InputGate
Use this function to compute the truth value of a gate (which depends on the type of gate).

computeOutput(boolean, boolean) - Method in class gates.XORgate
 
ConnectGates - Class in command
This command wraps the task of connecting two gates in the model of a logic circuits board.
ConnectGates(LogicBoard, Vector2Int, Vector2Int, GateIndex) - Constructor for class command.ConnectGates
Constructs a command to connect two gates in the model.
connectionsToDraw - Variable in class gui.TiledCanvas
Store the endpoints of each connection that needs to be drawn.
ConstGate - Class in gates
Inherit from this class for gates which have no input gates (TRUEgate and FALSEgate)

controller - Variable in class gui.ButtonPalette
Responsible for handling user input.
controller - Variable in class gui.LogicBoardGUI
The GUI informs the controller over user interactions, which the controller then processes.
controller - Variable in class gui.LogicBoardMenu
The controller can access information from the GUI and pass it on to the model.
Controller - Class in app
Central part of the program
Controller() - Constructor for class app.Controller

cross(Vector3Int) - Method in class utility.Vector3Int
Compute the cross product of this vector and another vector.
customGreen - Variable in class gui.TiledCanvas
Color used for connections, where the output at the start of the connection is TRUE.
customRed - Variable in class gui.TiledCanvas
Color used for connections, where the output at the start of the connection is FALSE.
